localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

previous.excerpt:
If you’re following, I’ve check my clean efts and stocks,

ICLN, LIT,LAC, SEDG all moving up pre market.

I can only assume this is the start of a greater shift towards green stocks
after the election, but I’m just a plumber, so it could be noise.

https://ibb.co/7RqPwr5
previous.title: TAN and other clean energy stock moving up big this evening premarket

localize.title: 谭恩美和其他清洁能源类股今晚盘前大幅上涨
localize.the_new_excerpt:
如果你跟着我，我已经检查了我干净的尾部和库存，

ICLN，LIT，LAC，SEDG都在上市前上升。

我只能假设这是向绿色股票更大转变的开始。
选举之后，但我只是个水管工，所以可能会有噪音。

https://ibb.co/7RqPwr5

localize.title: 譚恩美和其他清潔能源類股今晚盤前大幅上漲
localize.the_new_excerpt:
如果你跟着我，我已經檢查了我乾淨的尾部和庫存，

ICLN，LIT，LAC，SEDG都在上市前上升。

我只能假設這是向綠色股票更大轉變的開始。
選舉之後，但我只是個水管工，所以可能會有噪音。

https://ibb.co/7RqPwr5

that the tesla bubble was going to pop anytime now. It appears that tesla is
going to be permanently viewed as a ~600B company at minimum going forward.

For those who are familar with Gary Black. He provides nuanced…
next.title: Tesla's incredible run continues, up 28% in the last month and 15% in the last week. Now at $3850 pre split and $770 post split

localize.title: 特斯拉令人难以置信的涨势仍在继续，上个月上涨了28%，最近一周上涨了15%。现在拆分前为3850美元，拆分后为770美元
